00028 void initializeField(const Real value) {
00029   const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00030   const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00031   // Case: Only scalar field DOF
00032   for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) 
00033     _field[i] =  value;       
00034 };

00036 // Random
00037 void initializeField() {
00038   const uint numNodes = _myMesh->getNumberOfNodes();
00039   const uint dim = _myMesh->getDimension();
00040   // Case: Only scalar field DOF
00041   for (uint i = 0; i < numNodes; i++) {
00042     _field[i] = (0.5-double(rand())/double(RAND_MAX));   
00043     //_prevField[i] = 0.0; //*********************************** Implicit Time stepping *****************
00044   }
00045 };

00053     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, Real fact) {
00054       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getNumberOfNodes())*_nodeDoF;
00055       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00056         _field[i] += fact*localValues[i];
00057     };

00062       // assert( id < _field.size() && dof < dim );
00063       _field[id] += value;
00064     }

00101       out.close();
